channel.title: How can i let somebody host my server?
channel.description:
how am i able to let sombody host my server? do i have to email them the files or something? and if i did.. is it possible for them to just steal it ?
the reason for this is becuase i own both a pk server and a non-pk server and a equal amount of ppl like both =o so i dont know which server i should put up :(

I dont think you can have other ppl host your server
and it would be stealable, but ill look into it, if you tell me hwo to do something.
Im working on a no-ip, but idk what i gotta do with my router, and it asks for a username or password?
what is it usually? idk…

here you go… here is the tut i used to make a server… i believe the link for a source is down so just ask some1 for it by creating a new topic… this is 1 of the tuts i used =)… also lol dont do that agen on my post plz =\

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,37596.0.html[br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2007, 09:28:25

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,56932.0.html[br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2007, 09:29:39 PM[/size][hr]and thats only for this section of the forums[br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2007, 09:31:03 PM[/size][hr]no1 knows?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2007, 09:48:47 PM[/size][hr]well i gota eat =p hopefully som1 tells me how by the time i get back :)[br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2007, 09:51:11 PM[/size][hr]back! but nobody answered me =([br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2007, 10:05:29 PM[/size][hr]=(
